events.description: Mike Tauchman strikes out swinging. 1 out

Ian Happ lines out to left fielder Bryan Reynolds. 3 outs
Ke'Bryan Hayes singles on a ground ball to left fielder Ian Happ.
Bryan Reynolds doubles (27) on a line drive to right fielder Seiya Suzuki. Ke'Bryan Hayes to 3rd.
Andrew McCutchen grounds out, third baseman Nick Madrigal to first baseman Cody Bellinger. Ke'Bryan Hayes scores. Bryan Reynolds to 3rd. 1 out
Joshua Palacios reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by second baseman Nico Hoerner. Bryan Reynolds scores.
Connor Joe walks. Joshua Palacios to 2nd.
